org.teatrove.trove.file
Interface DataFileBuffer

All Superinterfaces:
FileBuffer
public interface DataFileBuffer
extends FileBuffer

Extends the regular FileBuffer interface for providing I/O operations on primitive data types.

Author:
Brian S O'Neill
